titles: The righteous taken away from the evil to come applied to the death of the late excellent Queen, in a sermon preach'd at St. Martin's Church, on Sunday, January the twentieth, 1694/5, before the mayor, baliffs, and commonalty of the city of Oxford / by White Kennett ...
author: Kennett, White, 1660-1728.
publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, for George West ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Mary --  II, --  Queen of England, 1662-1694 --  Sermons.
